column4: ok, i'm at this website (http://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/How_to_get_special_keys_to_work#acpi_fakekey ) reading about acpi_fakekey. I follow most of what he's saying, but I get lost when he uses xev to check something. I don't see what he's doing here and why. anyone want to take a look and try to help me out?
xev is adevice to report the key input for a key.
to map a specific key to the use of acpi_fakekey
